title: ZorroTV.net
author: ZorroTV.net
content: Helloim Zorro and i just like to share my story and how i started my online business with the greatest invention bitcoin & blockchain technology. i am communication engineer, Master degree in science MS, i work in satellite broadcasting for televisions since 2008, i provide Live Television channels locally via dish network (cable) and i started in 2018 to provide streaming via iptv technology, this service depend on internet speed and in 2018 was no high encoding technologies so anyone want to use iptv service need very high internet speed. it was at the beginning, in last two years technologies enhanced everything, the internet speed played the main  thing which anyone can watch almost everything from his smart phone or smart device. this make me step into the next step and start building my online business. mainly, provide LIVE premium sports channels in all languages with SD, HD, and 4K quality. work on almost any kind of smart device from phones to android box, ios mac win smartTV.. my main goal to put all world wide tv channels in one place and provide it to global people. from my service anyone can watch US channels from india for example or Spanish people can watch south America channels... one service for global.. it wasn't an easy job and takes alot of works, programing, marketing, technical, support...www.ZorroTv.net is the website address of my small business, i provide my service from this place, people can pay me via paypal credit card or international transfers and banks... nobody paid me from his bank, one person paid via OMT western union witch need to put your cloth on you and go to nearest OMT office to send money... it takes time for a 12$. paypal and credits cards payments worked for me good and i started my business in very good shape. happy when i hear customers telling their friends about my website. this means my service is trusted for my customers. everything was good till paypal and credits payment stopped in my country i was unable to get my money from bank and paypal restrict my country from any transaction. my local currency  after some political problems. one usd was 15,000 Lira in 2019, today one usd equal 30,000 while army general with three starts get 3,000,000 lira er month. imagine how much normal people can get per month. its not my subject here anyway... a friend of me discussed Bitcoin and cryptos with me, he said i can get paid and send money securely, fast, with low fees. i can put some codes in my website and start getting paid... interesting thing so i go home and started to learn about bitcoin and cryptos. i bought a very good book "The Bitcoin Standard" for dr saifedean ammous  (https://saifedean.com). i red the book in few days,  watched videos on youtube, search the internet and read articles... after few days, the website was able to get paid in main cryptos. bitcoin, ethereum, light coin, bnb, usdt.. no new customers after one week, so i put some ads on social telling my website is accepting bitcoin payments... after days my phone notified me that someone is paid with bitcoin.. i checked my merchant panel he was from spain. i approved his payment and send him service subscription code before read all payment details. i was surprised on how fast i get paid, near to zero fees and now i have Bitcoin in my coinbase wallet. i swear i no sleep that night, i started to think on how much bitcoin network and block chain technology can effect and change the global in payments and financial services. no third party persons like banks to take fees and approve my own money, i don't have to trust the guy who sent me the money,  he know what he is doing and how he pay no need for payment support... when i put on my website that i accept bitcoin as payment this was like an big ad for my business, people started to subscribe on my website. they watch sports mainly but some asking about movies, documentaries channels.. but mainly sports, people love europe football tournaments laLiga serieA Bundesliga champions league... also UFC and MMA have good lovers globally, some people can not watch the UFC live depend on which country they live and satellites don't cover the region... satellite footprint problems which means no satellite can cover all earth so this is one of my service power. No my aypal and credits cards payment is disabled and i only get paid via crypto. this is enough for me. my customers are bitcoiners. bitcoiners mainly smarts people, understand the technology and easy to talk with them. i will re enable other payment methods but belive me im good with only crypto payment method on my website.i didn't talked bout the website let me give you a free subscription to try my service www.zorrotv.net/trystart building you online business, dont let the idea on papers or in your mind, write it on paper and start building your own career, i may help you if you have any questions write me (go@zorrotv.net) or reply.Thanks for reading
